ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Expanded — Arid Shrubland
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki
ModMetaData.description: A giraffe is probably the most recognizable african animal. For some reason, it’s not in the vanilla base game, and your african tribe immersion is forever ruined. Crocodiles can never hunt you around the river bank, hippopotami can’t rip your arms off with a single bite and you can’t hear coyotes around the campfires. Except, now you can.
